elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.description: Link to the hair care products page.

elements.description: Link to the air purifier products page.

elements.description: Link to the lighting products page.

elements.description: Link to the support page.

DysonIndiaPage.description: This is the Dyson India homepage, primarily used for showcasing and selling Dyson products, particularly vacuum cleaners and air purifiers. It also provides access to other product categories and support resources.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find specific products or parts.

elements.name: Shop now
elements.description: Button to navigate to the purifier product page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners
elements.description: Link to the vacuum cleaners product category page.

elements.name: Deals
elements.description: Link to the deals page.

elements.name: Air purifier
elements.description: Link to the air purifier product category page.

assertions: Header text 'Compact. Powerful. Yet quiet.' is visible
The 'Search products and parts' search box is present

DysonVacuumCleanersPage.description: This page is the Dyson Vacuum & Wet Cleaners landing page, showcasing different types of vacuum cleaners.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Tab
elements.description: Link to the Vacuum & wet cleaners section.

elements.name: Search products and parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Cord-free Vacuums
elements.description: Link to Cord-free Vacuums section.

elements.name: Corded vacuums
elements.description: Link to Corded vacuums section.

elements.name: Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners
elements.description: Link to Wet & Dry vacuum cleaners section.

elements.name: Wet floor cleaners
elements.description: Link to Wet floor cleaners section.

elements.name: Shop all vacuum cleaners
elements.description: Link to Shop all vacuum cleaners section.

elements.name: Help me choose
elements.description: Button to help me choose a vacuum cleaner.

elements.name: Close Exclusive Offer
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive offer.

assertions: Page contains the heading 'Vacuums & wet cleaners'
The 'Search products and parts' search box is present
The 'Help me choose' button is present

DysonHairCarePage.description: This page is the Dyson Hair Care landing page, showcasing various hair care products and related information.

elements.name: Hair Care Link
elements.description: Link to the main Hair Care section.

elements.description: Link to the Hair Stylers product category.

elements.name: Hair Dryers Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Dryers product category.

elements.name: Hair Straighteners Link
elements.description: Link to the Hair Straighteners product category.

elements.name: Shop all hair care
elements.description: Link to the all Hair Care product category.

assertions: The 'Search products and parts' search box is visible

DysonAirTreatmentPage.description: This page is the Dyson India Headphones landing page, showcasing Dyson's headphone products and related information.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input box to find products and parts.

elements.name: Headphones Link
elements.description: Link to the Headphones product category page.

elements.name: Deals Link
elements.description: Link to the Deals page.

elements.name: Vacuum & wet cleaners Link
elements.description: Link to the Vacuum & wet cleaners page.

elements.name: Air purifier Link
elements.description: Link to the Air purifier page.

elements.name: Lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the Lighting page.

elements.name: Support Link
elements.description: Link to the Support page.

elements.name: Best sellers Link
elements.description: Link to the Best sellers page.

elements.name: Close Reward Points Banner
elements.description: Button to close the reward points banner.

DysonHeadphonesPage.description: This page is the landing page for Dyson Headphones, specifically the 'ontrac' model. It showcases the product and provides a 'Shop now' call to action.

elements.name: Shop Now Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the product page or add the headphones to the cart.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Headphones Navigation Link
elements.description: Link to the headphones category page.

elements.name: Close Promotion Banner
elements.description: Button to close the promotion banner at the bottom of the page.

assertions: Header text 'ontrac Headphones, remastered' is present

DysonLightingPage.description: This page displays information about Dyson Lighting products.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field to find products and parts.

elements.name: Lighting Navigation Link
elements.description: Link to the main Lighting product page.

elements.name: Dyson Solarcycle Morph Link
elements.description: Link to the Dyson Solarcycle Morph product page.

elements.name: Shop lighting Link
elements.description: Link to the Shop lighting product page.

elements.name: Exclusive Reward Points Banner Close Button
elements.description: Button to close the exclusive reward points banner.

assertions: Dyson lighting is engineered for task performance with precise colour accuracy, daylight tracking and shadow reduction, ensuring accurate creative work is supported.

UnknownPage.description: This is the Dyson Support page where users can find solutions to problems, spare parts, expert tips, and guides for their Dyson machines.

elements.name: Search Products and Parts
elements.description: Search input field for products and parts.

elements.name: Solve a problem
elements.description: Link to the 'Solve a problem' section.

elements.name: Find the right part
elements.description: Link to the 'Find the right part' section.

elements.name: Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.primary_locator: text=Tips, user guides and software updates
elements.description: Link to the 'Tips, user guides and software updates' section.

elements.name: Support Link in Header
elements.description: Link to the support page in the header navigation.

assertions: Page contains the text 'Solve a problem, find spare parts and read expert tips and guides.'
